InterlockJS

  • Documentation
  • Chat

  • Github

InterlockJS is a build tool for universal javascript and beyond.

Python friendly.

Interlock fully embraces the Zen of Python, both for internal implementation and for all developer-facing tools and interfaces.

All core compilation options can be set through command-line flags. When command-line flags turn cumbersome, Interlock provides a rich JS API and configuration format.

Powerful extensibility.

The core of Interlock is very small - many features that Interlock provides are implemented as plugins. All compilation steps are fully documented with an exploratory interface, and plugins tend to be short and sweet.

Interlock makes no distinction between "loaders" and "plugins". Ultimately, both effect the output of the build, and a separate And with other tools, the line has often become rather blurry, in practice.
